about_the_game:
Do you ever feel alone? Like no matter what you do, it is not good enough? Follow the characters along their journey of fighting negative emotions and finding purpose. The game includes 8 unique mini game styled boss fights that take you through a story loop across 3 gradually increasing difficulty versions, for a total of 24 levels, all with a special twist. Navigate the surprises of frustration, the doubts of confusion, and the challenges of arrogance to make it to the other side of this compact narrative adventure. But remember, the grass isn’t always greener on the other side…

So do you have what it takes to defeat the fireballs that rage throws at you? Can you make it through the maze of darkness to beat sadness? Will you pick up all the pieces when insecurity has you down?

Always remember, no matter what you are going through, you are never alone and you do have what it takes to make it to the other side… and you just might make some friends along the way.

Key Features

  • Controller support
  • Level select
  • 8 unique bosses
  • 3 difficulty levels, adding new twists to each boss fight, for a total of 24 playable levels
  • All original pixel art
  • Unique and all custom made music, sound effects & animations

highlighted.name: Don’t let fear stop you from your dreams
There is nothing to rage at
Always get back up when you’re feeling sad
Don’t be afraid to stand out

name: Interwoven Emotions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Interwoven Emotions is a narrative puzzle game where you follow the characters to fight negative emotions and find purpose. Do you have what it takes to defeat the fire rage throws at you, navigate the maze of sadness, or ability to pick up the pieces when insecurity has you down? Let’s find out…
